name: Save Princess (Miki18Games)
description:
I have been learning UE4 for 1 (or 2) years and this is a kind of test for me :D . And I also teached myself a few things, while I was doing this project. If you want to see my other works or know me better, you're welcome to my social media:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Miki1877852468

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ0LzpilrLkSSuOC226Evdg

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

How to instal this game:

1. Download file (.rar)

2. Unzip rar

3. Go to the folder Save Princess -> WindowsNoEditor -> Save_Princess.exe

4. To uninstall this game you have to just remove the folder with game

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

My future plans:

Full release (game finish)

optimization

list of missions

& many more!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Newest updates:

Release version Alpha 0.1

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

License:

1. Don't upload game to different website/pages/clouds (but you can always put link there :) ).

2. When you record/stream it on Youtube/Twitch/another platform, please put link to this game in description/outro/intro.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Warning: I'm not responsible for any computer damage or health injuries caused playing this game.
